--- 

## 1. Description of Changes

Provide a concise summary of the changes introduced in this pull request.

*   **What:** 
*   **Why:** 
*   **How:** 

---

## 2. Type of Change

*   [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
*   [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
*   [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
*   [ ] Refactoring (code style changes, etc.)
*   [ ] Documentation update
*   [ ] CI/CD improvement
*   [ ] Other (please specify): 

---

## 3. Checklist

*   [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING guidelines](https://github.com/chirag127/ConsoleAI-DevTools-Copilot-Browser-Extension/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
*   [ ] My code adheres to the project's coding standards and style guidelines.
*   [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
*   [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
*   [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable).
*   [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors.
*   [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works (if applicable).
*   [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
*   [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published.

---
